prompts.name: API Test
prompts.content: Test the translation API endpoints. Start with a health check, then test file upload and translation with a small file in test mode.

prompts.name: Docker Build
prompts.description: Build and run the Docker container
prompts.content: Build the Docker image and run the container. Test that the API is accessible and working properly.

prompts.name: Progress Debug
prompts.content: Debug any issues with progress tracking for translation jobs. Check that callbacks are working and progress updates are being sent correctly.

prompts.name: Add Translation Model
prompts.description: Add support for a new translation model
prompts.content: Add support for a new translation model. Update the TranslationModel enum, add the model class mapping, and test the integration.

prompts.name: Deploy to AWS
prompts.content: Help deploy this FastAPI application to AWS. Discuss the best deployment options and help set up the necessary infrastructure.

prompts.name: Performance Optimization
prompts.content: Review the API performance and suggest optimizations. Look at database queries, file handling, and async operations.

prompts.name: Add Tests
prompts.content: Add comprehensive tests for the API endpoints and translation functionality. Include unit tests, integration tests, and error handling tests.

prompts.name: Security Review
prompts.content: Review the API for security issues. Check authentication, file upload validation, input sanitization, and potential vulnerabilities.
